subject: RE: [junit] Continuous Hours of Stress/Operation Test
msgSnippet: JUnitPerf is a decorator that spawns the test across threads within a single VM. Enhanced JUnit (http://www.javatesting.com/Product/enhancedjunit/ ) hasa load
messageBody:
JUnitPerf is a decorator that spawns the test across threads within a
single VM. Enhanced JUnit
(http://www.javatesting.com/Product/enhancedjunit/ ) hasa load testing
component that disburses the test across multiple threads, VMs and
machines, and graphs the response times in real time. For details, scan
down to the section on "Junit/load" in:
http://www.silvermark.com/Product/enhancedjunit/documentation/enhancedju
nit.pdf. Which tool is appropriate depends on whether you need the extra
power or functionality that Enhanced JUnit provides, but they are indeed
very different tools.

- Mike

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@...]

> Subject: Re: [junit] Continuous Hours of Stress/Operation Test
>
>
> Jason Rogers wrote:
>
> >JunitPerf does this as well, doesn't it?
> >
> >
>
> Indeed, it does.
>
> Mike
